languages.text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any ranged weapon in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% critical damage to all attacks made against it.

When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程武器{/g}攻击周围1格的目标时，此次攻击会施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。此外，遭到攻击的目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。
languages.original_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器攻击周围1格的目标时，此次攻击会施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。此外，遭到攻击的目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。
当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器攻击周围1格的目标时，此次攻击会施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（10）。此外，遭到攻击的目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。

languages.text: Когда персонаж атакует цель {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционным{/g} оружием на расстоянии 1 клетки, эта атака накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10). Также от любых атак цель получает на 25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} больше.
languages.original_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж атакует цель дистанционным оружием на расстоянии 1 клетки, эта атака накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10). Также от любых атак цель получает на 25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического урона{/g} больше.

Когда персонаж атакует цель дистанционным оружием на расстоянии 1 клетки, эта атака накладывает {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (10). Также от любых атак цель получает на 25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критического урона{/g} больше.

languages.text: 使用者が1セル以内の範囲で{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠距離武器{/g}でターゲットを攻撃した場合、その攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を付与する。ターゲットはさらに受ける攻撃すべての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が25%増える。
languages.original_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が1セル以内の範囲で{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンでターゲットを攻撃した場合、その攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を負わせる。ターゲットはさらに受ける攻撃すべての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が25％増える。

使用者が1セル以内の範囲で{g|Encyclopedia:Range}レンジ{/g}ウェポンでターゲットを攻撃した場合、その攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(10)を負わせる。ターゲットはさらに受ける攻撃すべての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}が25％増える。

languages.text: Si el portador ataca un objetivo con un {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arma a distancia{/g} a un radio de 1 casilla, dicho ataque inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10). El objetivo también sufre +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} aplicado a todos los ataques que recibe.
languages.original_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador ataca un objetivo con un arma a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} a un radio de 1 casilla, dicho ataque inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (10). El objetivo también sufre +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}daño crítico{/g} aplicado a todos los ataques que recibe.

languages.text: Greift der Träger ein Ziel mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} in einem Radius von 1 Feld an, verursacht dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10). Das Ziel erleidet außerdem +25 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} durch alle Angriffe.
languages.original_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: Greift der Träger ein Ziel mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}waffe in einem 1-Zellen-Radius an, verursacht dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (10). Das Ziel erleidet außerdem +25 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Schaden{/g} bei allen eingehenden Angriffen.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur attaque une cible avec une {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}arme à distance{/g} à une portée de 1 case, cette attaque inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10). La cible subit également +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} chaque fois qu'elle est attaquée.
languages.original_text: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur attaque une cible à l'aide d'une arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} à une portée de 1 case, cette attaque inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10). La cible subit également +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g} chaque fois qu'elle est attaquée.

Lorsque l'utilisateur attaque une cible à l'aide d'une arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} à une portée de 1 case, cette attaque inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (10). La cible subit également +25 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}dégâts critiques{/g} chaque fois qu'elle est attaquée.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli silahla{/g} 1 hücrelik menzilden bir hedefe saldırırsa bu saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanamaya{/g} (10) sebep olur. Hedef, ayrıca her türlü saldırıdan +%25 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g} alır.

The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.
